content:
I have a build of the Extended Contact detail updates in progress here if people want a look at it.
http://build.fhir.org/branches/PatientAdmin_BP-ExtendedContactDetail/metadatatypes.html#ExtendedContactDetail
There's some build issue on how that's rendering that I'm trying to chase down.

@Brian Postlethwaite - Thank you.
Is this a proposed change to the existing Patient.contact structure? Can you provide a bit more background?

It will not change patient, person, RelatedPerson or practitioner.
(can't change patient as it is Normative)
Seeking input if we've missed others where this would be important.
